entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 11:09 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
